name: The Only Way is Down (beeguy)
description:
Oh look! A lost little soul has ended up in hell. What will he do?  Will he be complacent and endure agony for eternity?

HELL NO

He demands to talk to Hell's manager! He will gather as many tools as he can and descend further down into the bottomless pits of Hell to confront Satan himself and escape this nightmare to return to the land of the living!
